features: Take Your Organizational Skills To The Next Level: Absolutely practical & charming! Transform the pretty spiral notebook into an ultimate masterpiece collection of all your creative ideas, thoughts, recipes, research or travel notes - great for home, school & work

Plenty Of Space - All Your Notes in 1 Place: With 300 pages/150 sheets, ZICOTOs’ B5 college ruled notebook is finally a cute note book that brings you pure joy by allowing you to gather all notes in one place, instead of dealing with multiple journals for writing!

Beautiful Modern Notebook Journal For Women & Men: Thanks to its gorgeous design with golden edges, a beige linen hardcover with gold foil lettering and a golden wire, the spiral journal notebook is perfect for a variety of professional and personal uses

Smart Features For Maximum Convenience: The thick notebooks are college ruled for easy, neat and readable writing! In the clever back pocket you can keep additional notes, paper stuff & co. and an elastic band helps to keep it all together while looking fabulous

Durable Premium Design - Top-Notch Hardcover Notebook: Ink-friendly 100gsm thick pages (not perforated), edge protectors & strong double wire bound that allows for easy turning of pages - one could say, this college notebook is made for heavy and light thoughts
body.description: Thick Spiral Notebook By ZICOTO: Smartly Gather Your Notes, Ideas & Co. In One Well-Organized Place - For All Areas Of Life! There are countless brilliant reasons to use a note book, and this hardcover notebook from ZICOTO puts the icing on the cake. With 300 pages (aka 150 sheets), you can collect and easily jot down all your wildest thoughts, creative ideas, yummy recipes, exciting travel plans, research notes and more in just one B5 sized college notebook. Simply practical, isn't it? Make the hardcover notebook a well-organized extension of your brain! Not only thanks to its great capacity, but also due to its stylish and modern design, the college ruled notebook is fantastic for multiple areas of use. Whether at home as journals for writing your personal thoughts, setting goals or planning family adventures, at school or university for note-taking in class or even at work for meetings & project planning, the notebook journal for women and men is designed to make your life easier - and your organization & planning more effective. Beautifully designed with premium features: golden edge projectors, a rose-golden, strong double wire bound and ink-friendly 100gsm thick pages (note: the pages are not perforated) makes the spiral journal your top-notch choice. A cute, practical elastic band and a back pocket for additional papers or keepsakes are excellent additions for added convenience. The notebooks are college ruled to ensure easy, neat and legible writing. Ditch your multi-notebook organization, collect & manage all your open brain tabs in one place only - ZICOTOs’ thick journal notebook makes it happen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought a couple of these for my wife, who uses them at her desk for work, and she loves them! These are by far the best quality spiral notebooks either one of us has ever used. It's a relatively small expense to feel like you're working in an executive corner office instead of a cubicle - LOL.The size is a bit smaller than the typical letter size pages we get here in the us in the usual office store spiral notebooks, but still big enough to essentially do the same job. And the paper inside is far superior. The binders, too, are sturdy and good looking. And the spiral itself is hefty and turns the pages evenly instead of on an angle.All in all, a very nice product of the highest quality for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful notebook, with a gorgeous cover and excellent paper. The spiral binding looks to be sturdy as well. Just what I was looking for - a notebook that I really want to write in and fill up with all my thoughts and feelings. I would highly recommend this notebook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This notebook is as nice as it looks! Lovely linen cover, classic metal features, thick amount of pages. Will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful and well made, I’d definitely buy another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect! I bought this to keep up with my important notes for work and it is so much better than in the photos. It’s exactly what I wanted and the pocket at the back is an added bonus! The “thank you” card enclosed has a message and photo so it actually successfully gave that personal touch to my order. Carry, Emmy, & John, you are very welcome. You just gained a loyal customer. I will definitely be repurchasing. <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great high quality notebook
reviews.reviewText: Honestly only complaint is I got the wrong color but other than that it is great. The pages are thick and the cover is hard and textured smooth. I love this will be purchasing more from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m very surprised with the quality of this journal and I can’t wait to use it for my 2024 reading journal. It had super fast shipping and got here within 3 days. The paper feels super sturdy and I love the spiral binding, it makes journaling so much easier when you don’t have much space to have a notebook opened all the way. I love the metal around the corners because it will help keep it from getting too banged up when I travel. I really was not expecting it to be this high quality. Just get the notebook, you won’t regret it.
